00012 #include "McPerturbationFactory.h"

00014 // Subclasses of Perturbation
00015 #include "McEnergyPerturbation.h"
00016 #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00017 #include "McPairPerturbation.h"
00018 #include <mcMd/mcSimulation/McSystem.h>
00019 #include <mcMd/potentials/pair/McPairPotential.h>
00020 #include <inter/pair/LJPair.h>
00021 #include <inter/pair/DpdPair.h>
00022 #endif
00023 
00024 #ifdef INTER_EXTERNAL
00025 #include "McExternalPerturbation.h"
00026 #include <mcMd/mcSimulation/McSystem.h>
00027 #include <mcMd/potentials/external/ExternalPotential.h>
00028 #include <inter/external/TanhCosineExternal.h>
00029 #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00030 #include "McPairExternalPerturbation.h"
00031 #include <mcMd/potentials/pair/McPairPotential.h>
00032 #include <inter/pair/LJPair.h>
00033 #include <inter/pair/DpdPair.h>
00034 #endif
00035 #endif
00036 
00037 namespace McMd
00038 {
00039 
00040    using namespace Util;
00041    using namespace Inter;
00042 
00043    McPerturbationFactory::McPerturbationFactory(McSystem& system)
00044     : systemPtr_(&system)
00045    {}
00046 
00047    /* 
00048    * Return a pointer to a instance of Peturbation subclass className.
00049    */
00050    Perturbation* McPerturbationFactory::factory(const std::string &className) const
00051    {
00052       Perturbation *ptr = 0;
00053 
00054       // Try subfactories first
00055       ptr = trySubfactories(className);
00056       if (ptr) return ptr;
00057 
00058       if (className == "McEnergyPerturbation") {
00059          ptr = new McEnergyPerturbation(*systemPtr_);
00060       }
00061       #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00062       else if (className == "McPairPerturbation") {
00063          const std::string& interactionClassName = systemPtr_->pairPotential().
00064             interactionClassName();
00065          if (interactionClassName == "LJPair") {
00066             ptr = new McPairPerturbation<LJPair> (*systemPtr_);
00067          } else if (interactionClassName == "DpdPair") {
00068             ptr = new McPairPerturbation<DpdPair> (*systemPtr_);
00069          } else {
00070             UTIL_THROW("Unsupported pair potential.");
00071          }
00072       } 
00073       #endif
00074       #ifdef INTER_EXTERNAL
00075       #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00076       else if (className == "McPairExternalPerturbation") {
00077          const std::string& pairInteractionClassName = systemPtr_->pairPotential().interactionClassName();
00078          const std::string& externalInteractionClassName = systemPtr_->externalPotential().interactionClassName();
00079          if (pairInteractionClassName == "LJPair") {
00080             if (externalInteractionClassName == "TanhCosineExternal") {
00081                ptr = new McPairExternalPerturbation<LJPair,TanhCosineExternal> (*systemPtr_);
00082             } else {
00083                UTIL_THROW("Unsupported external potential.");
00084             }
00085          } else if (pairInteractionClassName == "DpdPair") {
00086             if (externalInteractionClassName == "TanhCosineExternal") {
00087                ptr = new McPairExternalPerturbation<DpdPair,TanhCosineExternal> (*systemPtr_);
00088             } else {
00089                UTIL_THROW("Unsupported external potential.");
00090             }
00091          } else {
00092             UTIL_THROW("Unsupported pair potential.");
00093          }
00094       }
00095       #endif 
00096       #endif
00097       #ifdef INTER_EXTERNAL
00098       else if (className == "McExternalPerturbation") {
00099          const std::string& interactionClassName = systemPtr_->externalPotential().
00100             interactionClassName();
00101          if (interactionClassName == "TanhCosineExternal") {
00102             ptr = new McExternalPerturbation<TanhCosineExternal> (*systemPtr_);
00103          } else {
00104             UTIL_THROW("Unsupported external potential.");
00105          }
00106       }
00107       #endif
00108       return ptr;
00109    }
00110 
00111 }
00112 
00113 #endif
00114 #endif  // #ifdef  MCMD_PERTURB
